short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide distractions and track time spent on YouTube.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Distraction-Free YouTube is a Chrome extension designed to help users focus on their YouTube experience by hiding distracting elements like comments, sidebars, and related videos. Ideal for students, professionals, and anyone who values focus, this extension allows users to enjoy YouTube content without unnecessary clutter. With a simple toggle interface, you can activate distraction-free mode or selectively hide comments and suggestions. Focus on what matters and enjoy a cleaner, more streamlined YouTube experience!
